creator: felix.schumacher@internetallee.de
text:
Created attachment 28295
Correct a typo lanaguage->language, add an 'are' and remove version number 5 from tomcat

Three minor glitches in the examples jsp's.
 * Lanaguage -> Language 
  this mistake seems to be copied in modules/jdbc-pool
 * mentioning of tomcat 5
  While this is certainly true, it is also true for 6, 7 and trunk. So removing the number seems right to me
 * add an 'are'
  Here I am not 100% sure, if are is really missing.

Thanks Felix. Applied to trunk in r1242495 and to TC 7 in r1242499. Will be part of 7.0.26. Keep the contributions coming :)

Regards,

Rainer
creator: rainer.jung@kippdata.de
